definition: abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: In her, led by Prince Albert also bought a Patek Philippe table.
sentences.chinese: 在她所領導的阿爾伯特王子也買了百達翡麗表。

sentences.english: Albert's thoughts whirled, and he was thrilled and excited.
sentences.chinese: 阿爾伯特思潮起伏，心情激動。

sentences.english: The custom of topping a tree also goes back to Prince Alberts time.
sentences.chinese: 這一風俗也要追溯到阿爾伯特親王時代。

sentences.english: Her marriage to Albert of Saxe-Coburg and Gotha was a love match.
sentences.chinese: 她的與阿爾伯特的婚姻是出自真正愛情的婚姻。

sentences.english: He smoked Prince Albert tobacco in cigarettes he rolled himself.
sentences.chinese: 他自己曾把阿爾伯特王子牌的菸草捲成菸捲兒吸。

sentences.english: We held trials every week up at Albert Park in Salford on the floodlit Astroturf.
sentences.chinese: 我們每週都在薩爾福德的阿爾伯特公園舉辦選秀。

sentences.english: The Einsteins, however, couldn't pay for the education that young Albert need.
sentences.chinese: 然而愛因斯坦夫婦付不起小阿爾伯特所需學費。

sentences.english: I rent a room from Mrs Albert.
sentences.chinese: 我租了阿爾伯特夫人的一間房。
小阿爾伯特原本喜歡老鼠。

sentences.english: Do you think Albert will resent you for your actions?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲阿爾伯特會對你的行爲感到生氣嗎？

sentences.english: So, the first part, Little Albert's fine with the white rabbit.
sentences.chinese: 起先，小阿爾伯特並不害怕小白兔。

sentences.english: And as a result of this, Little Albert grew afraid of the rat.
sentences.chinese: 這樣做導致的結果就是，小阿爾伯特開始懼怕老鼠。

definition: the Franks (Germanic people who arrived in Europe from 600 AD and took over France)
Schröder (name)/Gerhard Schröder (1944-), German SPD politician, Chancellor 1998-2005
variant of 邱吉爾|邱吉尔[Qiu1 ji2 er3]

pinyin: Wei2 duo1 li4 ya4 Nu:3 wang2

definition: Ur (Sumerian city c. 4500 BC in modern Iraq)
